info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 17 at 9:00PM CDT until August 23 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Twin Cities/Chanhassen MN
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota...
Cottonwood River Above Springfield affecting Brown County.
Minnesota River at Granite Falls HWY 212 affecting Yellow Medicine, Chippewa and Renville Counties.
Redwood River near Redwood Falls affecting Redwood County.
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota...
Cottonwood River at New Ulm affecting Brown County.
Minnesota River at Morton affecting Renville and Redwood Counties.
Minnesota River at Montevideo affecting Yellow Medicine, Chippewa and Lac qui Parle Counties.
* WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Cottonwood River above Springfield.
* WHEN...Until Saturday morning.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 830 PM CDT Sunday, the stage was 21.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 27.9 feet Tuesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 28.0 feet on 07/18/2016.
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY MORNING
